summary.title: A Brief Info about Myself
summary.para_1: I am a full stack developer currently working in Intercloud Ltd., Bangladesh as a software engineer. I have a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Chittagond University and Technology. In my university years, I have participated in various competitive programming contests. CS is not only my professional background but also and above all has been a passion for myself.
summary.para_2: At Intercloud Ltd., I work as a software engineer in their cloud system department. My work here includes building and integrating various features for their public cloud system. I have been involved in developing their simple storage service and the payment system.

projects.title: Projects & Researchs
projects.description: Highlight of some of my works

projectList.title: Multi-label Emotion Classification of Tweets Using Machine Learning
projectList.content:
Multi label emotion classification is the process of classify a text into various emotions that it represents. In this work, we performed multi label emotion classification of tweets using various advance multi label classification methods. 8 emotion classes and 13 different multi label classification methods were used in this work.

Springer Link: https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/978-981-16-6636-0_53

projectList.title: Simple Storage Service for Brilliant Cloud Platform
projectList.content:
An object storage service designed for Brilliant Cloud Platform. It acts and works like aws s3. It has it's own s3 compatible APIs. Customers of all sizes and industries can store and protect any amount of data for virtually any use case, such as data lakes, cloud-native applications, and mobile apps. The customer has the option to share the stored objects over the internet.

Brilliant Portal Link: https://bcp.brilliant.com.bd/

projectList.title: E-commerce Marketplace with Hybrid Recommendation System
projectList.content:
A Hybrid Recommendation System was developed using both collaborative and content-based filtering system. It was then deployed as part of an E-commerce website where a user can create accounts, browse products, buy and sell products. The Recommendation system was developed using Python and the E-commerce website was designed using Pythonâ€™s Django Framework.

Github: https://github.com/simon7426/ecom-project
